channel.title: George Grosz on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in George Grosz on Artangled

item.title: Interlude - Nicole Eisenman at Secession
item.description: My abiding feeling on the US presidential election results is totally unoriginal: relief. As messy as the withdrawal will be, it’s likely Trump is on his way - for now. With London on lockdown and the galleries closed, I’ve been thinking today about the various anti-Trump art I’ve seen over the past four years. (I don’t recall seeing any pro-Trump art, outside of my favourite meme-based Twitter account.) Early on in his first - only!
